ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Stacking DOTS
ygData.msgSnippet: My wife and I have discovered that Leach (lvl 12) stacks..  I can cast it and moments later she does and we both get the skull symbol on the screen and we both
ygData.messageBody:
My wife and I have discovered that Leach (lvl 12) stacks.. I can cast it and moments
later she does and we both get the skull symbol on the screen and we both get the life!

-Poppa



Naeeldar wrote:

> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
> Heh of course our dots don't stack with other necros that's not what he was
> asking. he was asking if all the dots he has in his spellbook stack.
>
> The biggest problems with necros on big raids like planes and dragons is
> that our dots do not stack. The only dot that stacks with others is Bonds of
> Death.
>
> Naeeldar Level 50 Dark Elf Necromancer
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: ashcroftjt@... <ashcroftjt@...>
> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>;
> AshcroftJT@... <AshcroftJT@...>
> Date: Sunday, March 26, 2000 6:38 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Stacking DOTS
>
> >From: ashcroftjt@...
> >
> ><< All the necro dots stack as long as it's not a lower level version of
> the
> > spell. IE your using Ignite Blood and Boil Blood.
> >
> > Naeeldar Level 50 Dark Elf Necromancer
> > >>
> >
> > I 'll test tonight but I dont think your correct
> >
> >Im 50 I cast ignite blood , your 50th you cast ignite blood it will not
> stick
> >is my point,
> >same with any DOT two necros can not use same dots and stack. I may be
> wrong
> >I will test again. I know whenever I group with a necro we make sure we
> are
> >not casting same spells.
> > If Im understanding you.. your saying we both can cast ignite blood and
> >both stick for 2400 damage hmmmm.....
> >
> >Zakrell Lu' Dan
> >50th Tunare
> >
> >
